content: Yu Guan is a post-doctoral fellow in the ICTEAM institute at UCLouvain working with Prof. Pierre-Antoine Absil. Her research interests include tensor decomposition, tensor completion and machine learning. She got her PHD degree at National University of Singapore under the supervisor Prof. Delin Chu.
